titleStmt.title: In Nobilissimi, piissimi{que} Iuvenis. GƲLIELMI MORI, à Rowallan, Equitis aurati, cognati sui vnice chari, piam de cruce poesin, IOANNIS GELLII à Gelliestoun, Med. D. EPIGRAMMA.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: In Nobilissimi, piissimi{que} Iuvenis. GƲLIELMI MORI, à Rowallan, Equitis aurati, cognati sui vnice chari, piam de cruce poesin, IOANNIS GELLII à Gelliestoun, Med. D. EPIGRAMMA.

monogr.title: The true crucifixe for true Catholickes or The way for true Catholickes to haue the true crucifixe. By Sr. William Moore, To: of Rovvallane Knight
monogr.author: Mure, William, Sir

div.head: In Nobilissimi, piissimi{que} Iuvenis. GƲLIELMI MORI, à Rowallan, Equitis aurati, cognati sui vnice chari, piam de cruce poesin, IOANNIS GELLII à Gelliestoun, Med. D. EPIGRAMMA.
div.l: SI facienda canens, faciensve canenda meretur
Laudem, tu gemino dignus honore cluis.
Carmina digna facis, vita est dignissima versu:
Illa Sophum monstrant; vita, me los{que} pium.
Macte jugo tali: coeunt vix nexibus vsquam
Trina vno, pietas, ingenium, at{que} genus.
Plurima MORE tuis debes Majoribus: olim
Stirps tua debebit postera plura tibi.
